title: IORG Defending Democracy Forum: Research on Chinese Influence Operations Against Taiwan
subtitle: 2021.3.6 IORG Research Forum
html:
Key findings

IORG is able to verify, with publicly verifiable scientific methods, that...

  • The Chinese Communist Party is engaged in information manipulation against Taiwan.
  • Among information manipulation collaborators, “local collaborators” are key to the spread of Chinese information manipulation against Taiwan.
  • The Chinese Communist Party is proactively infiltrating Taiwan through interpersonal connections, with the Strait Forum serving as the annual performance review.
Read 14 Research Key FindingsRead Research Reports

Latest update to the reports can be found on IORG’s website.

Basic Info

  • Time = 2021.3.6 Saturday 10:00 – 17:15
  • Location = GIS MOTC Convention Center = 24 Section 1, Hangzhou South Road, Zhongzheng District, Taipei City, Taiwan
  • Host = IORG
  • Live-streaming = youtu.be/hZD-qsWQ7tg
